name: Virtual-Q
tag_list: cloud-computing, cloud-desktop, cloudtop, hosted-vdi, vdi, better-vdi, vdi-that-works, vdi-with-roi, vdi-with-better-tco
overview: Virtual-Q, a Houston-based startup, has developed breakthrough technology for enterprise cloudtop computing. “Cloudtops” provide the capabilities of desktops and laptops, but with the all of the processing performed, and all of the data resident, in a secure datacenter. Virtual-Q’s cloudtops help organizations improve worker productivity, reduce their total cost of ownership, assure business continuity, safeguard sensitive data, improve compliance, and leverage their existing IT investments. The company’s proprietary virtualization technology represents a new paradigm for Computing-as-a-Service (CaaS), delivering a complete, cloud-based IT environment (cloudtop) accessible from virtually any Internet-connected device, including iPads and iPhones. The Q Cloudtop includes the latest Microsoft Windows operating system and Office Suite technologies. It delivers unparalleled performance while extending the useful life of existing desktop and laptop devices. Virtual-Q is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and works closely with other leading technology vendors.
